title: Ping Problems Patch 6.16

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Hello, I have been suffering from this issue ever since I launched league today on my computer, I went into a ranked game with my friend to find out I had 452ms-492ms which is unplayable especially in ranked so I restarted my router thinking it would fix it and I could still play the game but it did not work and I got reported and received a loss because of this. Yesterday when I was playing league I had my normal ping 31ms-40ms. I have restarted my router multiple times which has not fixed the issue.

replies.body: Myself, and a few people I know, are having the exact same issues. This has only appeared after patching to 6.16. Help! D:

You might be experiencing a network issue or packet loss that's causing you to have delays in-game.  The troubleshooting done so far is good, but our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide are specifically tailored to help get you back in-game without issue.  Hopefully, this will get you fixed up for good!

i play on the NA servers and got this problem from patch 6.14 and until now i cant play the game properly i tried everything but with no use , my internet and computer works great i play alot of online games without a problem , pls fix this because alot of people are having this issue without a fix.

Myself and a friend of mine also have the issue OP described. I have tried everything described in the connection issues support thread, among other things, and nothing has made a difference. The only thing i can think of for an explanation is there might be a problem with our ISP, virgin media. However I have no other internet issues whatsoever, only high ping in League.
The problem seems to have fixed itself now.

I've been having very similar issues. It is stopping me from playing my ranked games, sitting at Silver IV with 100LP and I can't go into ranked because I don't want my games ruined by this ping issue. Clearly it isn't just me that's having it and it NEEDS to be sorted out. I'll start a game with 27 ping at a constant, as it always has been, then not in 10 minutes in, it'll be bouncing from 150 - 600 for the rest of the game and ruin everything I try to do. Considering I play a lot of Ahri {{champion:103}} I'm not able to land skillshots or make plays.

Please, please! Riot fix this.
The ping jumps to around 500 for me too. Had a game today where it went all the way past 1000.
